page.title: 06Cheadle Organisations
page.content: Cheadle is well served by Local Organ- -isations.They are as follows-Town Council(21 members),Women's Institute, Royal British Legion,O.A.P. Club,The Historical Society,Widows Club,The Camera Club,The Angling Club,Disabled Club,Animal Welfare,Rotary,Inner Wheel& Ladies Circle,Army Cadet Corps,Young Farmers,Gardeners,Gilbert & Sullivan, C.A.T.S.(Drama Society),Football Clubs(Junior & Senior),Cricket Clubs,Darts Leagues,Mentally & Physically Handicapped Clubs. For the younger element there are Guides,Brownies, Cubs,Scouts,Youth & Judo Clubs.There are Marching Bands& Dancing Troupes-Cheadle Paraders.The Leisure Centre provides a wide range of Pysical Activiies & there is a florishing Swimming Club.The Churches have many affiliatedd organisations.
